name: Moroseness (Guilvector)
description:
"This game contains depictions of depression, anxiety, and suicide, and may not be suitable for all audiences. It also contains bright flashing imagery that may cause discomfort and/or seizures for those with photosensitive epilepsy. Viewer discretion is advised." GAMEPLAY CONTROLS:
  • "Arrow keys" To move.
  • "Z"                  To interact with the world.
  • "X"                  To cancel actions.
  • "C"                  To open the menu.
  • "F4"                To enter fullscreen mode (exe version).
HOW TO PLAY:

Moroseness is a short roleplaying game, where you play as a cow, exploring it's dreams. The world reacts to the actions and decisions you make in the cow's dreams, shaping the "story" in interesting(?) ways.

  • Try to interact with every object! (Press "Z" to interact).
    There is hidden/extra dialogue everywhere.
  • Keep in mind that all choices you make matter and have consequences.
    Try to make different choices in new playthroughs!

(P.S. Please be nice to the creatures you meet, or not. You will just hurt their feelings.)

FAQ

  • Q: What is this?
    • A: It is a complete remake, of the first prototype version.
  • Q: Is this the full release?
    • A: No! We plan to add more content in the near future™
  • Q: Is this remake, any different from the original?
    • A: Yes! A lot of content and maps, have been changed and redone from scratch.
  • Q: Who developed this version?
    • A: Both Guilvector and Nick44.
NOTE: It is recommended, (unless you are on a mobile device), to play the standalone version and not the browser one.
